Uses of Package
org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio

  • Packages that use org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio 
    Package Description
    org.apache.mina.example.chat.client
    Swing based chat client.
    org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio
    Socket (TCP/IP) and Datagram (UDP/IP) support based on Java NIO (New I/O) API.
  • Classes in org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio used by org.apache.mina.example.chat.client 
    Class and Description
    NioSocketConnector
    IoConnector for socket transport (TCP/IP).
  • Classes in org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio used by org.apache.mina.transport.socket.nio 
    Class and Description

    An IoSession which is managed by the NIO transport.
